nodes.bodyText:
I think this should be java.specification.version rather than java.vm.specification.version. See https://docs.oracle.com/javase/8/docs/technotes/guides/versioning/spec/versioning2.html#wp90020.
We use java.specification.version elsewhere in Bnd. 
  
    
      bnd/biz.aQute.bndlib/src/aQute/bnd/build/defaults.bnd
    
    
        Lines 30 to 31
      in
      a926910
    
    
    
    

        
          
           javac.source: ${def;java.specification.version;1.8} 
        

        
          
           javac.target: ${def;java.specification.version;1.8}
